biotools.summary: RDKit-based overlap measure that combines volumetric shape and pharmacophoric features to give a combined overlap score similar to OpenEye's Tversky Combo and Malhotra and Karanicolas' COS measure.

bioschemas.name: SuCOS
bioschemas.summary: RDKit-based overlap measure that combines volumetric shape and pharmacophoric features to give a combined overlap score similar to OpenEye's Tversky Combo and Malhotra and Karanicolas' COS measure.
